sentence.Network_en: Pug's short assured answers were instinctive returns of the hard straight quizzing.
sentence.Network_cn: 帕格用那几句简短而有把握的话不加思索地答复了对方单刀直入的追询.

sentence.Network_en: You are quizzing me and Miss Anderson.
sentence.Network_cn: 你是在拿我和发德逊小姐开玩笑.

sentence.Network_en: Those piercing eyes quizzing him made Fred shrink.
sentence.Network_cn: 杨辉见到大胡子王老师两眼炯炯地望著他,有点害怕.

list.abs: intermediate ESL quizzes : grammar & vocabulary quizzes , gerunds & infinitives , perfect tenses , past continuous , computer vocabulary quizzes and many more …中级英语ESL测试题：语法与词汇测试题，动名词与动词不定式，完成时，过去进行式，电脑词汇测试题等等。
总成积cram最低甄选分数；临界分数daily quizzes-
Philby quizzed me on my thinking about science ., 菲尔比询问了我对科学的看法.

entry.def: A quiz is a game or competition in which someone tests your knowledge by asking you questions.

example.ex: We'll have a quiz at the end of the show.
example.tran: 节目的最后我们要举行一次智力竞赛。

entry.def: If you are quizzed by someone about something, they ask you questions about it.

example.ex: He was quizzed about his income, debts and eligibility for state benefits...
example.tran: 他被问及收入、债务以及是否有资格享受政府发放的救济金等问题。

example.ex: Sybil quizzed her about life as a working girl.
example.tran: 西比尔询问了她当女工的生活。

auth_sentence.content: By quizzing Arthur...he could...get the fellow's name.
auth_sentence.res_content: By quizzing Arthur...he could...get the fellow's name.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By quizzing Arthur...he could...get the fellow's name.
